alert.note: Alert for Armstrong; Butler; Clarion; Forest; Indiana; Jefferson; Venango; Westmoreland (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 01 at 1:59PM EDT until April 01 at 2:45PM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pittsburgh has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Venango County in northwestern Pennsylvania... Northern Butler County in west central Pennsylvania... Indiana County in west central Pennsylvania... Jefferson County in west central Pennsylvania... Northwestern Westmoreland County in southwestern Pennsylvania... Armstrong County in west central Pennsylvania... Clarion County in west central Pennsylvania... Forest County in northwestern Pennsylvania... * Until 245 PM EDT. * At 158 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Oil City to Plum, moving east at 65 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines, resulting in some power outages. * Locations impacted include... Indiana, Oil City, Franklin, Punxsutawney, Clarion, Vandergrift, Kittanning, Brookville, Marienville, Apollo, Knox, and Rimersburg. This includes Interstate 80 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 33 and 96. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please report severe weather by calling 412-262-1988, posting to the NWS Pittsburgh Facebook page, or using Twitter @NWSPITTSBURGH.

area.areaDesc: Armstrong; Butler; Clarion; Forest; Indiana; Jefferson; Venango; Westmoreland
